name: File_ListFromComputeNode
description: Lists all of the files in task directories on the specified compute node.

poolId.description: The id of the pool that contains the compute node.

nodeId.description: The id of the compute node whose files you want to list.

recursive.description: Whether to list children of a directory.

maxresults.description: The maximum number of items to return in the response.

timeout.description: The maximum time that the server can spend processing the request, in seconds. The default is 30 seconds.

client-request-id.description: The caller-generated request identity, in the form of a GUID with no decoration such as curly braces, e.g. 9C4D50EE-2D56-4CD3-8152-34347DC9F2B0.

return-client-request-id.description: Whether the server should return the client-request-id identifier in the response.

ocp-date.description: The time the request was issued. If not specified, this header will be automatically populated with the current system clock time.

$block: Response to a FileOperation.ListFromComputeNode or FileOperation.ListFromTask request.

$ul: **odata.nextLink**: The URL to get the next set of results.

$block: An error response received from the Azure Batch service.

$ul: **code**: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.
**message**: An error message received in an Azure Batch error response.
**lang**: The language code of the error message
**values**: A collection of key-value pairs containing additional details about the error.
